title: Honor Teases Big Launch for MWC 2025
description: Honor wants to go all-in with AI software. The post Honor Teases Big Launch for MWC 2025 appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Honor wants to go all-in with AI software.
text: With AI product integration having swept through pretty much every consumer tech category over the past few years, it’s not too surprising to see big brands and manufacturers within the industry capitalize on the trend. As we’ve seen before, Honor’s ventures into AI-powered software offerings has been going on steadily, and it seems that the company is preparing a big announcement rather soon. READ: Honor Integrates DeepSeek AI Into YOYO Assistant, Making It Smarter Than Ever Dubbed as the “HONOR ALPHA Plan,” the company says that it will be showcasing its latest advancements in AI, as well as AI-based products. The event is scheduled March 2nd at Barcelona, during MWC 2025. Honor didn’t mention anything too specific however, although it adds that it’s aiming to work with more companies towards AI development. As per a statement from Honor: In this transformative era of AI, the ‘HONOR ALPHA Plan’ positions us at the forefront of technological advancement. We aim to build an open-collaborative AI ecosystem with our global partners, creating unprecedented possibilities for the future of AI devices. With that being said, we’re bound to see a ton of big announcements once MWC goes live this year.
html:
With AI product integration having swept through pretty much every consumer tech category over the past few years, it’s not too surprising to see big brands and manufacturers within the industry capitalize on the trend. As we’ve seen before, Honor’s ventures into AI-powered software offerings has been going on steadily, and it seems that the company is preparing a big announcement rather soon.

READ: Honor Integrates DeepSeek AI Into YOYO Assistant, Making It Smarter Than Ever

Dubbed as the “HONOR ALPHA Plan,” the company says that it will be showcasing its latest advancements in AI, as well as AI-based products. The event is scheduled March 2nd at Barcelona, during MWC 2025. Honor didn’t mention anything too specific however, although it adds that it’s aiming to work with more companies towards AI development. As per a statement from Honor:

In this transformative era of AI, the ‘HONOR ALPHA Plan’ positions us at the forefront of technological advancement. We aim to build an open-collaborative AI ecosystem with our global partners, creating unprecedented possibilities for the future of AI devices.

With that being said, we’re bound to see a ton of big announcements once MWC goes live this year.
